name: Eszter Morvay
description: Eszter is the founder of Code for Corona. She is a prospective Software Developer studying Computer Science at USC.

name: Karim Rahal
description: Karim is an Ethical Hacker who has been part of the Bug Bounty scene since the age of 13. Currently, he is a Computer Science major at USC and is specializing in Computer Security.

name: Lance Yu
description: Lance is a Computer Science (Games) major at USC.

name: Spencer Lin
description: Spencer is currently a CS major at USC and the vice president of Code For Corona.  He is also the founder of a 501(c)(3) nonprofit called Planet Save that partners with USC to help protect the environment.  Aside from work, Spencer is a racing drone enthusiast who's down to race, if you are!
